Title: Lay your hands on the Remnant of Safety
Text:
~Stone Mound | Shallow Isles~

This strange man has shown me something called a Remnant of Safety. He claims that when I die, my body will be brought back here, fully healed.

He says that to lock my soul onto it, all I have to do is lay my hands upon it. Might as well.

QuestManual.Slot: Lay your hands on the Remnant of Safety
